select b.name as parentName, a.id as id, a.name as name, a.parent_id as parentId, a.media_type as mediaType, a.unique_key_need as uniqueKeyNeed, a.status as status, a.allow_multi as allowMulti, a.multi_num as multiNum, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime from ad_media_type as a, ad_media_type as b where a.parent_id = b.id;
